idea-plugin.name: Clean-Code-Sweep
idea-plugin.description:
English introduction: A collection of small code tools, including the following functions: 1. Remove blank lines from the file. 2. Add @param annotations to the method parameters of the Mapper interface file, automatically extract the method parameter names as the value of the @Param annotation. 3. Convert single-line comments of class attributes to JavaDoc comments. (Many one-click document generation plug-ins, such as FastRequest, are based on JavaDoc comments, so this function can be used with these plug-ins) 4. Add annotations to class attributes according to the document comments of the class attributes, such as: generate @ApiModelProperty annotations, @ExcelProperty annotations, @JsonProperty annotations, etc. according to document comments. call menu shortcut key：ctrl+alt+c All functions can be used at the current file level, selected file level, and selected folder level. They will take effect on all selected files. More small functions are under development. Welcome to GitHub for suggestions.
中文介绍： 代码小工具合集，包含以下功能： 1. 去掉文件空白行。 2. Mapper接口文件方法参数添加@param注解，自动提取方法参数名作为@Param注解的value值。 3. 类属性单行注释转JavaDoc注释。(很多一键生成文档的插件，如FastRequest，都是基于JavaDoc注释的，所以这个功能可以配合这些插件使用) 4. 根据类属性的文档注释给类属性添加注解，如：根据文档注释生成@ApiModelProperty注解,@ExcelProperty注解,@JsonProperty注解等。 呼出菜单快捷键：ctrl+alt+c 所有功能都可以在当前文件，选中文件，选中文件夹等级别使用，会对选中的所有文件生效。 更多小功能正在开发中，欢迎Github提出建议。
